channel.title: Rune Topia Shit
channel.description:
Hello, I have been working on this a little bit every so often, and well its still shit, I am releasing it because I have nothing better to do.
Features List:
Thread Per Client removed - saving and loading works both ways, .txt and .dat Crash patched A few more packets done Cleaned up the client class a bit Other stuff you will have to look
Credits List:
Me Graham Blakeman8195 Fox2007 'Rich _Reforced Zdiddy maker (I am not sure who you are?) White Fang (Is that correctly spelled?) Daiki WinterLove Jagex
If you feel I left you out, I am sorry just send me a PM and tell me what you did to get the credit. :P
I will not post any pictures, there's really nothing to take a picture worth while for.
Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?bzjmnzkigym
EDIT: Shit server is shit.

item.title: Rune Topia Shit
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

str8golden:

/spam -.-’ its a shit server seriously…

I see no spam in this thread, nor is the thread spam. I gave a feature list, credits and a download link, this follows the rules. Sorry.

item.title: Rune Topia Shit
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Its nothing special, just a few fixes here and there, and some cleaning. I don’t have much time to do anything with it, plus it might have a few missing things.

Once I get time after school this summer I will be able to clean and work a lot more on this pile of poo.

Read full topic
